0.2.0.name: wordpress/exxmlrpc
0.2.0.description:
ExXmlRpc for WordPressPost is a plugin to post to WordPress from WordPressPost. *Interface with WordPressPost and WordPress.

The WordPressPost is windows software which can post to WordPress without using browser. Requires this plugin to post from WordPressPost, and ExXmlRpc doesn't work without WordPressPost.

[日本語の説明] You can check more information at the following site. http://wp.nethmk.com (The description is only Japanese.)
